name: devops
description: Just a little node application containing multiple devops tasks.
author: Roel van Lisdonk
notes: The npm package 'concurrently' is used to run multiple npm scripts in parallel. We don't use npm-run-all, because it has issues on Windows.
The npm package 'ts-node-dev' is used to run a node application, written in TypeScript, without transpiling to disk on each change, which makes it much faster.
The npm package 'typescript' is used for all coding.
